standard_clauses.law_section: RBI Master Direction, Fair Practices Code
standard_clauses.red_flag_if: interest rate not clearly specified or hidden charges
standard_clauses.plain_english: The annualized interest rate must be clearly disclosed.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: वार्षिक ब्याज दर स्पष्ट रूप से बताई जानी चाहिए।
standard_clauses.template_clause: The annualized rate of interest shall be [X]% p.a.

standard_clauses.red_flag_if: prepayment penalty on floating rate loans
standard_clauses.plain_english: No prepayment penalty can be charged on floating rate loans.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: फ्लोटिंग रेट ऋणों पर कोई प्रीपेमेंट जुर्माना नहीं लगाया जा सकता।
standard_clauses.template_clause: Prepayment of the loan may be made without penalty for floating rate loans.

standard_clauses.red_flag_if: EMI not clearly defined or includes hidden fees
standard_clauses.plain_english: EMI amount, tenure, and breakup must be clearly specified.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: EMI राशि, अवधि और विवरण स्पष्ट रूप से निर्दिष्ट होने चाहिए।
standard_clauses.template_clause: The EMI shall be INR [amount] for [X] months.

standard_clauses.red_flag_if: no cooling-off or look-up period for borrower
standard_clauses.plain_english: Borrower should have a look-up period to exit the loan without penalty.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: उधारकर्ता को बिना जुर्माने के ऋण से बाहर निकलने के लिए एक लुक-अप अवधि होनी चाहिए।
standard_clauses.template_clause: The Borrower shall have a look-up period of [X] days from the date of disbursement.

standard_clauses.red_flag_if: coercive or harassing recovery methods mentioned
standard_clauses.plain_english: Lender must follow fair recovery practices. Harassment is illegal.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: ऋणदाता को उचित वसूली प्रथाओं का पालन करना चाहिए। उत्पीड़न अवैध है।
standard_clauses.template_clause: Recovery shall be conducted in accordance with RBI Fair Practices Code.
